member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1
member.summary: A RotaryH1 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the current count of the encoder.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.GetDirection
member.summary: Gets the current direction that the encoder count is going.
member.returns: The direction the encoder count is going.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.ResetCount
member.summary: Resets the count on the module to 0.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.Direction
member.summary: The direction the encoder is being turned.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.Direction.CounterClockwise
member.summary: The encoder is moving in a counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RotaryH1.Direction.Clockwise
member.summary: The encoder is moving in a clockwise direction.
